      Cases in Kaluga and Kaluz province

      Cases in KalugaA wide variety of events occur with jealousy: absurd, funny and extraordinary. For example, trees are constantly falling in the face, sometimes the inseparability of " pumping " whole roses and alleys. And even the most harmless rain turns the city centre into a romantic Venice, where the proud collars are dispersed among the lousy-oceans on autogandols. In winter, sausages fall from the roof, straight to the head of the lost town, and in the summer from the same roof, the shepherd flies. In the gardens and gardens, the dorms detect the war of the Great Fatherland. Bears screaming wells, the Pitons crawl into women's bags, and the horses scare drivers on the tracks. In the controllers ' tracks, passengers are bitten, malicious television operators enter the White The house for the governor's meeting, and the winning doughnuts are hit by a heartless park. It is possible to feel the atmosphere of an unforgettable life of the city in this section, where it is always freshKaluga and Kaluz province incident report♪
